parameters.definition: Number of patients a helicopter can transport per trip
Time taken for one trip by helicopter
Number of patients a bus can transport per trip
Time taken for one trip by bus
Minimum number of patients that need transportation
Minimum percentage of trips that must be by helicopter
Maximum number of bus trips allowed

description: There has been a horrible accident and patients need to be taken to the hospital by either a helicopter or bus. A helicopter can transport \param{HelicopterCapacity} patients per trip and takes \param{HelicopterTripTime} hour. On the other hand, a bus can transport \param{BusCapacity} patients per trip and takes \param{BusTripTime} hours. At least \param{MinPatients} patients need to be transported and at least \param{MinHelicopterTripsPercentage} of the trips should be by helicopter. In addition, there can be at most \param{MaxBusTrips} bus trips. How should the patients be taken to minimize the total time to transport the patients?
